rows.label: tlk42360111_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Have you ever read "How
Wars Profit Nopon?", mo?

rows.label: tlk42360111_03_msg0002
rows.name:
It analyzes and writes about how much
the Nopon trade guilds would profit if
Superbia and Invidia went to war, mo.

rows.label: tlk42360111_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Since it was written by a Superbian, it's
full of misconceptions about the Nopon tribe,
which makes it interesting in a way, mo.

rows.label: tlk42360111_03_msg0004
rows.name:
It's so hilarious it makes you laugh
out loud, so everyone in the wheelhouse
is passing it around, mo.

rows.label: tlk42360111_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Even in tough times, that
book can make you laugh and
change your mood, mo.

rows.label: tlk42360111_03_msg0006
rows.name:
If you're interested, you
should buy it at Haskefell
Books in Superbia, mo!
